data.title: Setup Complete
data.metaTitle: JetStream Setup Complete - Welcome to Your Cell
data.metaDescription: Your JetStream Cell has been successfully configured. Access your dashboard to start managing packages and services.
data.subtitleText: Your cell management platform is ready to use
data.infoCardDescription: Your JetStream Cell has been successfully configured with OAuth2 authentication. You now have full administrative access to manage packages, deploy services, and configure your infrastructure.
